XRInputSourcesChangeEventAdded.summary:
The read-only
property added is a list of zero or
more input sources, each identified using an object,
which have been newly made available for use.
XRInputSourcesChangeEventAdded.value:
An {{jsxref("Array")}} of zero or more objects, each
representing one input device added to the XR system.

XRInputSourcesChangeEventXRInputSourcesC.summary:
The XRInputSourcesChangeEvent()
constructor creates and returns a new object,
representing an update to the list of available WebXR input devices. You
won't typically call this constructor yourself, as these events are created and sent to
you by the WebXR system.
XRInputSourcesChangeEventXRInputSourcesC.returns:
A new object configured based upon
the input parameters provided.
